steps: Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Proofing' group, click on the 'Spelling & Grammar' button.
Word will start checking the spelling and grammar in the document.
If any spelling mistakes are found, Word will suggest corrections.
Review the suggested corrections and click on the 'Change' button to automatically correct the spelling.
Repeat the above step for all the spelling mistakes in the document.
Once all the spelling mistakes are corrected, save the document.
